customFormat

public static java.lang.String customFormat(java.lang.String pattern,
                                            double value)
Formats a double value according to the supplied format. For example, given a pattern ".000" and a double 86.342342323, then the returned value will be 86.342.

Parameters:
pattern - the pattern the value should be formatted to.
value - the double to be formatted.
Returns:
the formatted double value as a string.

generateLogPath

public static java.lang.String generateLogPath(java.lang.String dir)
Constructs a unique log path for agent logs.

Parameters:
dir - a path to an existing directory that will host the log files.
Returns:
the path to a folder in which agent logs can be written.
